text: Luigi Pennacchio (born 1 January 1933) is an Italian ski jumper. He competed at the 1956 Winter Olympics and the 1960 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Italy Category:Ski jumpers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Ski jumpers at the 1960 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy
title: Luigi Pennacchio
